title: Tomato chutney with a bite
ingredients: ['1.5kg ripe tomatoes', '1 large onion', '350g brown soft sugar', '4 tablespoons fresh lime juice', '2 tablespoons fresh grated root ginger', '1 tablespoon chilli flakes', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '2 teaspoons salt', '1/4 teaspoon Cayenne pepper']
